text: The Taurus T4 is a rifle manufactured by Taurus Firearms. It was presented at the 2017 SHOT Showhttp://www.defesanet.com.br/armas/noticia/25885/Taurus- lanca-plataforma-de-armas-na-Brigada-Militar-do-RS/. The Taurus T4 is basically an M4 clone fully manufactured in the company's facilities now concentrated in the city of São Leopoldo, Brazil. The Taurus T4 is based on the US M4 5.56×45 mm carbine and is available in three versions with two different barrel lengths. All come with six-position telescopic stocks and Picatinny accessory rails. Taurus T4 rifle was idealized for military and police use.https://militaryleak.com/2018/08/01/taurus-t4-rifle/ ==Users== * : Used by several law enforcement agencieshttps://www.deamazonia.com.br/?q=278-conteudo-94127-policias-recebem- fuzis-e-equipamentos-para-reforco-da-seguranca-no-am and in limited role by the Armyhttps://revistanews.com.br/2018/09/20/taurus-doa-armas-ao-comando- militar-do-sul/. President Jair Bolsonaro's 2019 decree legalises the possession of T4 carbines by law-abiding citizens.https://g1.globo.com/politica/noticia/2019/05/20/decreto-de- bolsonaro-que-regulamenta-uso-e-porte-de-armas-no-pais-libera-compra-de-fuzil- por-qualquer-cidadao.ghtml * : Royal Oman Police * : Armed Forces of Senegalhttps://www.forte.jor.br/2020/05/28/senegal-compra-fuzis-e- submetralhadoras-da-taurus/ ==References== ==External links== * Official Taurus T4 webpage Category:Rifles of Brazil Category:Automatic rifles
